actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the increase in the cover over of tax on distilled spirits to Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the increase in the cover over of tax on distilled spirits to Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands. Requires, for a five year period, the treasury of Puerto Rico to make a Conservation Trust Fund transfer within 30 days from the date of each cover over payment made during such period. Permits a good cause exception. Defines a Conservation Trust Fund transfer.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the increase in the cover over of tax on distilled spirits to Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.
